com.qtfx.lib.task

Class TaskPool

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.concurrent.ForkJoinTask<Void>
      • com.qtfx.lib.task.Task
        • com.qtfx.lib.task.TaskPool
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Future<Void>

    public class TaskPool
extends Task
    A task that executes other tasks in concurrent pool. If one of the tasks of the pool is indeterminate, then all are considered indeterminate.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • setStateChangeListener

        private void setStateChangeListener()
        Set the state change listener. When a task fails with an exception, the task pool issues a cancel. this listener scans the tasks and if one has failed sets the state of this parent pool to failed also.

      • addTask

        public void addTask(TaskRun task)
